issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: In logical_plan.rs we have the function `lit_str`. We should add equivalents for all supported literal types.
fields.summary: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement functions for creating literal expressions for all types
